posts.post_content:
As Sooku said, they'd never reprint this flavor text. Just goes to show how pathetic this politically correct crap is.
  
The card is not so pathetic, at least. It's not an epic ability, but it can hold off an attack for a turn, and that's not half bad.

posts.post_content:
The flavor text wouldn't cause an uproar. The whole card taken as an object would.  
I mean, here we have Piety. So this man must be a pious man. Yet instead of seeing him praying or worshipping in some manner, we see him sitting on the toilet and reading the newspaper. If I was a Muslim I would be offended.
